titleHero: Elite Business Forum in the Pet Care Sector
descHero: It is an exclusive event dedicated to the pet care sector in Saudi Arabia. This event will provide a business-friendly environment for clients and company representatives from brand suppliers to showcase products, build communication channels, develop capabilities, exchange aspirations, and explore business opportunities and growth.
importance: Importance of the Forum And Expectations

importanceAndExpectations.title: Providing attractive smart shelves for brands inside stores and signing joint marketing plans
Lectures presented by top speakers and global managers in the sector
Meeting and discussing directly with brand owners
Workshops and professional courses for sector workers

provider: Provided by the German Quality Group
chooseDaysActivities: Please choose the day(s) and accompanying activities
